title: Prognostic Value of Body Fat Density in Colorectal Cancer Adjuvant Treatment: A Retrospective Cohort Study.
abstract: Adipose tissue radiodensity has emerged as a prognostic biomarker in oncology. This study aimed to assess its prognostic value in colorectal cancer (CRC) patients receiving adjuvant therapy. Body composition was quantified by computed tomography, with visceral (VAT
